hero.badge: Quality and trust are our motto
hero.title: Welcome to Al-Qudairani Company
hero.description: Al-Qudairani Poultry—long-standing expertise in the Syrian market, delivering premium products and integrated services in the poultry sector

about.heading: A rich history and a promising future in poultry farming
about.description: Founded in 1984 with a clear vision to lead the poultry sector in Syria. We proudly offer high-quality products covering all local market needs—from fresh eggs to meats—while fully adhering to global health and safety standards.
highlights: Years of extensive experience in the Syrian market
Modern technologies and a specialized team
Reliable supply chain and modern packaging

table-eggs.title: Table Eggs
table-eggs.description: Fresh eggs daily to the highest sorting and packaging standards.

hatching-eggs.title: Hatching Eggs
hatching-eggs.description: High-quality fertilized eggs with excellent hatch rates.

poultry-meat.title: Poultry Meat
poultry-meat.description: Supplying poultry meat with guaranteed quality and sound cold chains.

feeds.title: Feeds
feeds.description: Balanced feed formulations for all age stages.

medicines.title: Medicines & Vaccines
medicines.description: Vaccinations and antibiotics under veterinary oversight with approved standards.

broiler-chick.title: Broiler Chick
broiler-chick.description: Carefully selected broiler chicks for a sound productive start.

equipment.title: Equipment
equipment.description: Feeding, drinking, and ventilation equipment for poultry farms.

additives.title: Feed Additives
additives.description: Vitamins, boosters, and antioxidants to enhance performance.

notFound.title: Product not found

sections.heading: Sections related to this product
sections.description: A concise overview of the main sections and features

contact.heading: Contact us directly
contact.description: One number in two ways: direct call and WhatsApp

whyUs.heading: Why choose Al-Qudairani?
whyUs.description: We commit to delivering the best to our customers and partners through our steadfast values

features.title: Guaranteed Quality
features.desc: We ensure product quality through strict control at every stage of production.

features.title: Fast Delivery
features.desc: A wide distribution network covering all regions to ensure products arrive fresh.

features.title: Continuous Support
features.desc: Customer service and technical consultancy team ready around the clock.

partner.heading: Strategic partnership to grow your business
partner.description: Whether you run a restaurant, hotel, or retail store, we offer tailored solutions that fit your business size, with competitive pricing and flexible supply schedules.

questions.heading: Answers to common questions
questions.description: Quick information to help you understand our services and products.

items.q: How can I order products and arrange delivery?
items.a: Contact us via WhatsApp or phone to specify items and quantities, then we schedule delivery according to our routes.

items.q: Do you offer wholesale pricing and long-distance shipping?
items.a: Yes. We provide wholesale pricing and refrigerated shipping to provinces based on an agreement that ensures product integrity.

items.q: What quality standards do you follow for eggs and meat?
items.a: We perform routine checks, follow standard sorting and packaging, and maintain proper cold chains to ensure high quality.

items.q: Do you provide technical consultation for farms?
items.a: Yes. Our team offers technical support for vaccination, feeding, and operational management when needed.

items.q: How do I know daily availability?
items.a: Ask us via WhatsApp. We will share daily availability and the best time to place an order.

footer.description: One of the oldest poultry companies in Syria, providing all services and products related to poultry.
